> **Release Notes are generated automatically.** Just add a label to this PR so it appears in the right category:
>
> | Label | Release-note section |
> |-------|---------------------|
> | `bug` or `fix` | Bug Fixes |
> | `enhancement`, `api-change`, or `Missing Feature` | API Changes |
> | `breaking-change` | Breaking Changes |
> | `issue-fixed` | Issues Fixed |
> | `skip-changelog` | *(excluded from notes)* |
> | `documentation`, `ci`, `dependencies` | *(excluded from notes)* |
>
> PRs are also auto-labeled based on the files you change.
